website_summaries.verdict: Heavy-duty silicone mitts protects hands, wrists, and forearms from painful burns without extending the bulky silicone up the arm.
pros: Heavy-duty, heat-resistant silicone protects up to 450°F
Come in long and standard length black, long and standard length red, standard blue, standard gray, standard turquoise

customer_reviews.title: Burned through the mitts
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased when I got these yesterday - they are super long and comfortable. They are supposed to be heat resistant up to 450 degrees and since I have used silicone gloves in the past, I thought I would be fine. Imagine my surprise (and horror) when I took a full cookie sheet out of the oven and nearly dropped it from the pan burning my fingers through these mitts. I think the heat rating is really far off the actual resistance level. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Grantsbrarian

customer_reviews.title: Work great and are super soft
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the old cloth gloves for forever, and finally replaced them with these. They work great, and my hands do not feel any heat when handling hot items. Be aware that each glove color seems to have a different length than gloves of other colors. For example, these red ones are longer than the dark blue ones. At first these seemed huge, but really they are just longer than the old gloves. Also, the silicon on these gloves is super soft and pliable, making it easy to grab a pan handle. The old gloves were stiff in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Chue X

customer_reviews.title: A good safe purchase.
customer_reviews.text: When I put these on, I feel as if I could shove my hands into a hot oven without any hesitation of getting burned. Very well made. At first you'll feel a little clumsy as you definitely don't have the dexterity of touch and feel that you would get with a thinner glove, but those thinner gloves always failed to keep my hands from getting too hot if I kept them holding a hot "out of the over" dish for too long. The silicone design is thicker, but grips well and is not slippery at all. I could hold a hot dish for as long as I need to without panic setting in. Great gloves. Glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL J. LA CAPRIA

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: These grip good and are nice and long to better protect your wrist. I don't like that the inner stiching is seperate from the outer silicone so it can cause you to lose grip. The size is also very large. I finf myself more often using some of the other oven mitts that I have instead as they are easier and less bulky than these.
customer_reviews.author: DSM

customer_reviews.title: Awkward Design
customer_reviews.text: Not designed to a human hand. I purchased the longer length and should of got the regular short ones. They bind up and the mit is just way to big. Awkward design.
customer_reviews.author: FBICrackdown

customer_reviews.title: CAUGHT ON FIRE
customer_reviews.text: One of my gloves caught on fire when I left it on top of the oven. It was nowhere near an open flame, but the heat alone caused it to burn. Had I not been in the kitchen at the time, it could have done serious damage. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: JOSH K

customer_reviews.title: Not good after 15 seconds
customer_reviews.text: They are easy to clean, but hold heat for no longer than 15 seconds. If you plan to pick up a tray with a big beef roast or turkey or a lasagna and carefully walk a few steps till you reach the dinner table these mittens are not for you. They only prevent burns on your hands if you take the tray from the oven and immediately put them on the the kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Well-constructed but awkward design.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to; durable; well-made. My biggest complaint is that its shape is designed with the thumb sticking out from the side of the hand (i.e. like the shape of Michigan, or if you were waving at somebody), which is different from a gripping position (i.e. if you were operating a hand puppet, with the thumb moving outside of the plane formed by the palm and fingers). This means that the basic movement of gripping a pot, baking dish, etc., requires you to apply a lot more pressure with hand muscles to push the (very sturdy) silicone material in the direction you want.
customer_reviews.author: Sodium

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: The interior insulation ripped right where your fingers go after 2 weeks 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Abbadessa

customer_reviews.title: So So but Decent Value
customer_reviews.text: We got these after a buddy of mine burned through our paid while manning the grille. Our original pair was thicker and felt better made but these do what they're supposed to and were pretty good value so I'm not totally dissatisfied but I wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Noah M. Glassman

customer_reviews.title: Great insulation, no dexterity
customer_reviews.text: These oven mitts work great at protecting your hands when pulling pans out of the over or moving hot racks around. The only downside I've seen is that you have no dexterity at all with these on. That's not a major surprise, mittens have never excelled in that area, it's just something to keep in mind. I've found a special bonus with these, I put them on when I need to remove a particularly stubborn lid from a jar. I'm able to grip the lid far better with these on. I haven't had a lid that I can't crack with these on. Overall great product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Sasquatch

customer_reviews.title: these are great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I was afraid they wouldn't really work, but they DO! For the first time, maybe ever, I don't have to worry about burning my fingers even THROUGH a thick pair of oven mitts. These are long, bright colored (I got the cherry red) and flexible so easy to use. My daughter loved them on first sight. I did on first use. And they have a nice little loop to hang them up. Plus I love having an actual matched pair for once! Very Modern art looking.
customer_reviews.author: purple rain

customer_reviews.title: Great insulation and coverage
customer_reviews.text: I bake sourdough and my cast iron pan regularly gets preheated to temps of 450F and above for 30min or more. These babies are able to handle the heat! My hands are completely protected, as are my forearms due to to the high cuffs on these. No more accidental burns! The gloves do get hot if you are carrying a cast iron pan for longer than 20 seconds, but that time is all you need to get from the oven to counter. These gloves have also greatly reduced my fear of reaching into a hot oven to retrieve my pan. Would absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Y.

customer_reviews.title: As Good as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I had a set of old potholders that were not really heat resistant. In fact - I burned myself TWICE in the same night thinking that I misjudged rather than the potholders had failed. So after researching and seeking feedback from family - I decided to buy these. They work great. It has been a while since I have used a "glove" style pot holder so initially, they felt clunky but after a few uses - I adapted. I no longer need to worry about burning my fingers. I am just disappointed that the only color available at the time I purchased was red, I would have preferred the black ones.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for any situation
customer_reviews.text: These are very good. I'm used to the cloth oven mitts and I was skeptical of these but these are quite comfortable useful and grip better. They are a bit big, and I'm petite but they are still usable. You don't feel the heat when you are grabbing something hot, which is great. One thing I learned the hard way is wearing wet oven mitts while grabbing something hot, these could be soaking wet and I wouldn't feel a thing. If you are prone to burning yourself these a great at keeping your whole forearm safe from hitting the oven racks. They aren't super aesthetically pleasing, but more importantly they keep you safe. I highly reccomend them.
customer_reviews.author: Someone out There

customer_reviews.title: False reviews
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely shocked this product has received a 4-5 star average review after using this product for several weeks now. To give a more thorough and genuine review, the outside silicon layer is a slick surface causing it to be very difficult to grab and pull cookie sheets and other slick metal handles out of the oven. Additionally, the inner liner of the glove is starting to remove itself from the shell of the glove, adding more traction problems.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: One of my best kitchen purchases ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love these oven mitts. Honestly one of the best things I've bought for my kitchen. I cook with cast iron skillets and a dutch oven a lot, and those things get HOT. These oven mitts handle it like a champ. I also love that they're so long, it protects your wrists and forearms from burns pulling things in and out of the oven. In terms of durability, they are holding up great. I've used them almost every day and they're still in perfect condition. If you're looking for a fantastic pair of oven mitts, look no further! I would 100% recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Great mits!
customer_reviews.text: Love these mits! Super easy to clean and very thick. Love that they give me a better sense of safety when it comes to not getting burned. The rubber material makes cleaning them easy and if anything gets on the black part of the mits I just clean it with a wet cloth. Definitely can withstand the heat. I’m baking and cooking every day and they haven’t lost any amount of protraction against the heat. Way better than conventional cotton oven gloves which get burned and tattered over time.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Tested to 500'F!
customer_reviews.text: Why did I buy these gloves? I used my old fashioned cloth oven mitts to carry a cast iron pan from my outside BBQ grill to the kitchen. Seconds after I lifted the really hot (400'f+) cast iron pan with my old cloth mitts, I instantly dropped the pan on my deck when it was too hot to carry. Grilled veggies all over my deck. Ugh! Now that I have these Silicone gloves , I have repeatedly carried the same scorching hot pan effortless into the house. Yes, they perform as advertised. They are comfortable, easy to keep clean too. 5 stars! They are a huge advancement/ replacement over 'old-school' cloth oven mitts.
customer_reviews.author: BrookhavenGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great oven mitt
customer_reviews.text: We have used these about a half a dozen times pulling baked dishes from the oven and lifting a hot stoneware crock pot and we can't feel the heat radiating through at all. These replace old fabric oven mitts that may have had the lining shift so it had very little protection from heated pans or stoneware even with brief contact. The extra length gives me protection and confidence that I won't get burned when reaching into the hot oven. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: KoaMan

customer_reviews.title: recommended as "THE BEST OVEN MITT" - we were skeptical
customer_reviews.text: We saw these reviewed on several sites, recommended as "THE BEST OVEN MITT" - we were skeptical, but I can now agree, they really are awesome. We've spent more on mitts from high end kitchen stores, but these are better. The grips work really well, the extended coverage to the upper arm prevents those wrist and arm burns that I've gotten so many times in the past (when hendling heavy pans or not paying close enough attention when putting items into oven, or removing from oven). I'll be gifting these to friends and family, they're awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Figtwig

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I use these in the kitchen and at the barbecue grill. You don't have the dexterity of gloves, but the heat resistance and the long cuff are amazingly heat resistant. The mitt is still flexible, and I've had no problem lifting hot pans or sheet rays from the oven, or working at the grill. I don't know how well these would stand up in a commercial kitchen, but for the home cook these should last a long time. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Very different to other oven mitts
customer_reviews.text: First they have a good length which I have never found before. I think the appeal was the fact I could rinse them off quickly, where as the other material/heat resistant mitts which I have used for years, need more washing machine time to keep them decent looking. The other positive if that i can handle hot items like boiled eggs/potatoes straight from the saucepan or drainer without feeling any heat. How long they will last, I have no idea but the delivery presentation, thank you card, large storage bag, gave confidence that they were not a throw away item. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gerie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lefties!! I feel safe wearing these!
customer_reviews.text: I had gone through multiple oven mitts where that black rubber that works great at first finally gets worn through & your fingers come poking out the end..I went on amazon to find something that would work for me because i am left handed. These are perfect! They are completely interchangeable to use on either side on either hand!! The inside is super soft as well and I just feel like my hands are safe in them :)
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife, happy life
customer_reviews.text: My wife raves about these oven mitts. She used to curse the old quilted one each time she got burned. But no more. Those are now decorations for the kitchen which these do the work. I was glad I got the large ones since both our hands are fairly large. They fit well and are basically burn proof and water proof. We have used them to grab eggs out of boiling water, hot toast from the toaster, scorching pans from the over, move the grill while its hot, etc. They still look like new and burned hands are a thing of the past. And they are my wife's favorite color.
customer_reviews.author: traveleinfool

customer_reviews.title: The 3 bears of oven mitts and we didnt like it
customer_reviews.text: I do like these but they are NOT for people with large hands or tiny hands at all. Both my husband and I can hardly get our hands into them. They are very tight but we have big hands and I have long fingers. My daughter doesnt care for them because she has tiny hands and they are too big for her but she likes how long they are. So if your hands are average they are a nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Coser

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I've been meaning to buy new oven mitts for a long time now and boy am I glad I found these. The red color is fun, and the longer length is really helpful (one of those things you don't realize until you try them). Being so used to cloth mitts, you instinctively rush to remove something piping hot from the oven, but that honestly isn't necessary with these. Glad I got them - you will be too!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to grasp items
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for over a year now and they have definitely protected my hand/arm from burns. My frustration is I can not grip pans from the oven well at all. They don't bend well and just can't grasp the sides of muffin tins, bread tins and other oven pans that I normally grab with one hand. Now I have to use two hands and have smushed the tops of items while trying to grab the pans to remove them from the oven. Yes, they protect me from burns but they are so frustrating!!! Would not purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbid

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for hands and arms!!
customer_reviews.text: Best protection my hands and arms have had from heat and burns!! These mitts are pretty big, so guys that like to grill will really like these mitts. Some women may find these mitts too big for small hands. You trade off some dexterity to protect your hands and arms but well worth it. I rinse them off immediately after use. They clean up easily and remain looking like new. I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: TexasMusicMan

customer_reviews.title: FIRE 🔥 & WATER💦 ...same mitten!
customer_reviews.text: Damn, this is one of those products where you go: “why didn’t I think of that?” A dream come true for baking bread in 500F oven or screaming hot grill & fire pit handling ...then just stick it under running water so it looks as good as new - absolute win win!
customer_reviews.author: VoyT

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations... and Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: I must say that these mitts are better than I thought they would be for the price... and I'm really happy with the job they do. I grabbed a tray of roasted vegetables out of a 475° oven and they performed far better than a standard pot holder that I've used for years. The length is excellent and will prevent the burned wrist issues I've experienced in the past. I'm thinking about buying a few more pairs to have at the beach house and to use as holiday gifts for foodie friends. High perceived value, excellent performance at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Jacobs Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for my $2 chinese oven mitts.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I used to do all our cooking in a convection oven, so a pair of $2 gloves from china worked great, but once we moved into our own place with our own kitchen we found ourselves frequently getting burned. I had a hard time finding decent reviews for oven mitts on Amazon, but these fit the bill perfectly, they're a little more combersome to wear than the Chinese gloves, but that's just because they're really thick. Overall very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Bippy

customer_reviews.title: Way TOO big
customer_reviews.text: Unless you have gigantor hands, these are unreasonably huge. I mean HUGE. It's not just the length, which is how they are described. The hand size is so large it's actually clumsy to get a good grip on hot dishes, which could slip and become dangerous. I also don't like the cloth at the top. I would guess most kitchens are like mine, with occasional splashes of water on the counter. So, when you lay these down they are going to get wet, which means they have to sit out and dry.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coverage and heat protection
customer_reviews.text: Loved these oven mitts - great coverage and did not even feel the heat of removing 500 degree pan. The silicone grip is flexible and reliable - nothing is slipping out of your hands with these. Grabbed my sourdough out of the oven with them, and they cleaned up well on first use. They have a convenient loop so you can hang them, too. Not sure how well they will clean up with anything more messy due to the grooves in the mitt, but so far, so good. Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: DebDeb

customer_reviews.title: They keep heat off your hands!
customer_reviews.text: These oven mitts are great! I have used them several times in the last week (since receiving them) and they have been terrific so far. I have used them while handling pots both on the stove top as well as from the oven and have felt no heat penetrating through them. They are long enough to prevent burning on my forearms and my husband, who is 6'2", can easily use them even though his hands are much bigger than mine. They are much thinner than my old Pampered Chef oven mitts and I thought these new ones wouldn't keep the heat out as well, but happily, I was wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Melly

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These are hands down the best oven gloves I've ever owned. I took a375 degree glass dish out of the oven and had to hold on to it longer than usual due to poor planning and my fingers got warm but nowhere near burning. I love that they're long 'gauntlet' style because I had a bad habit of burning my arm on the oven door. That's no longer a problem! These would make a great gift. The recipient may think "Gee, oven gloves" but once they use them they'll appreciate them.
customer_reviews.author: Doug W

customer_reviews.title: Keep my hands cool
customer_reviews.text: Keep my hands cool and make me feel safe (I'm not good with hot things). I can hold the kitchen utensils safely, and even hold a thermometer as long as I'm careful not to let the lining get tangled around my fingers. Really pleased with these gloves (and they're easy to clean, and they're waterproof - no more "ouch" when liquid gets spilled).
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Deeth

customer_reviews.title: awesome oven gloves
customer_reviews.text: i found this product from an ad i saw on facebook. "top 25 items under 25.00 you have to buy on amazon" when i found these on the list, i had to get them (because my goldendoodle ate my other ones) these ones are long and cover your arms very well, and have great padding inside so you cant feel how hot something is if you have to hold with one hand while you make room on the counter with your other hand. i would for sure recommend these to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly9

customer_reviews.title: No more burns!
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé bought these for me because somehow I burn my arms when I'm pulling pans from the oven. It happens a lot, I have scars from it. I'm not even sure how I do it. These mitts go up to my elbows, and (disclaimer: don't try this at home, I do things like this because I'm an idiot) I heated a cast iron pan up t o at least 500 degrees and picked it up and held it with these mitts. They withstood it! I could feel warmth, but nothing I couldn't stand! Tough mitts!
customer_reviews.author: Gemyni Turner

customer_reviews.title: Very Protective
customer_reviews.text: These are long, a little big, and they are very protective. I bake and cook a lot, so burning myself is too common. Those days are over with these oven mitts! They are long enough on me that they fit up to my elbow (I am 5'3"). I've held hot dishes straight out of the oven and not felt the tiniest bit of warmth. Who knew that oven mitts could be so appreciated? These are to me. Will use for grilling and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: gottaread

customer_reviews.title: Great for a busy baker
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mother who has arthritis in her hands but still loves to bake. She has a double oven and has a hard time securely gripping bakeware with traditional fabric pot holders. I opted for this one instead of ones that had fingers due to her arthritis and these work out so well for her. I got the extra long ones and that allows her to grip better and support the bakeware with her arms if needed, especially for heavier casserole dishes.
customer_reviews.author: A.S Baze

customer_reviews.title: I love my wife a kids.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I love my wife and kids. My son likes to make pizza home made. My wife is Vietnamese and she is a speedy little lady. I didn’t want them getting burned hands or arms. These things work great and are well worth it. I’d buy them again but mine are fine. They’ll last for years and years.
customer_reviews.author: charles reinhardt

customer_reviews.title: I Highly recommend these mitts!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE these hot mitts! They actually WORK VERY WELL and without burning my hands!! I have tried so many brands but they always burned my hands. These look very nice (red) and are very comfortable to wear. The inside lining is very soft. And the price point is great! I highly recommend this brand and seller!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M.

customer_reviews.title: Best she's ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: My wife, who is extremely culinary in nature, stated that these were the best oven mitts she has ever owned. I've used them a few times to take pizzas out of the oven or for Thanksgiving and there's simply no chance you're getting burned. Not on your hands and not on your wrists and arms. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Shippy

customer_reviews.title: Best oven mitts I have ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid baker and have burned myself several times - but not since I bought these oven mitts - love them! They are completely heat resistant and the fact that they go all the way to the elbow makes a big difference when reaching into a deep oven.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: great oven mitts!
customer_reviews.text: These oven mitts are really comfortable to use. the quilting inside feels nice and, so far, I haven't felt any heat from anything I've taken out of the oven. I LOVE how high up they come on my arms - cover all my burn marks (I'm a bit of a klutz). so knowing, even if I do bump into something, my arms are covered is well worth it . The red is a bit brighter than expected but is a nice addition to my red/black/brown kitchen aesthetic. They even fit my husbands hands and arms. Looking forward to getting lots of use out of these :)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Pepe

customer_reviews.title: Great for all but large hands
customer_reviews.text: A little big for small hand (bulky, not tight-fitting, but hasn't slipped off or anything). Too small for big hands (the indention between thumb and pointer too shallow for big hands to fit all the way into the fingers). Overall, good for small to medium hands (women's mostly). Length is great. Heat resistance is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Severus Snape

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: The only good thing about these mitts is the arm length. They aren’t heat resistant l. You immediately have to go from oven to counter because even holding something for 2 seconds you start to feel it through the glove. You can wash them off since they’re rubber which is nice but they take forever to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Dyanna

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! I don’t feel any heat whatsoever, they have protect in all the right places (like where you always accidentally rest your arm on the oven door...), and I love that they are waterproof so I can use them for pressing hot jelly through the strainer or making fresh mozzarella.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Zehr

customer_reviews.title: Not heat resistant
customer_reviews.text: Not resistant to heat. Burns right through when removing a pan from the oven.
customer_reviews.author: SPJ

customer_reviews.title: Fast Delivery and Brand New
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice gloves. The black fabric at the bottom is also thick and very nice material The product was delivered quickly and is band new! They come in a large sealed ziplock bag. The gloves are nice quality and larger than I expected. I have large hands and they fit me so they should fit anyone. They will make a very nice gift. The red is very bright and will look nice hanging. Since it's a gift I have not tested them but form the loom and feel I definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Effective and Safe
customer_reviews.text: Like the length. Like the fact that they resist hot oil and boiling water that can soak into cloth style potholders. Lie flat enough to be useful as trivets. Very flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Pop Bop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect oven mitts
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a really good price. They're longer than I wanted, but the shorter ones actually cost more at the time of purchase. These are the first silicone oven mitts that I've owned, previously we've always had the fabric gloved ones with the rubber palm. They would always crack and would eventually not protect from heat and inevitably lead to horrible burns or dropped pans. My wife and I have used these a couple of times so far and don't have any complaints. They're comfortable, they protect from the heat, and they're a lot more flexible that I imagined that they would be. They're pretty much perfect. And my wife loves the bright red color.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Hershey

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Where are the hot pads? We could never find them! These arrived with a handle and we hung them up first thing! Now we can find them EVERY time we need them. They are excellent! Simple to clean. Not a bit of heat gets onto our hands. They go up quite a way on our arms! Simply a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Enciso

customer_reviews.title: No More Burns!
customer_reviews.text: These enormous mitts are just what a clumsy guy like me needs as he approaches the oven. They cover the lower part of my arms that have been burned countless times on the frame around the door, not to mention on the racks and the items being removed after cooking. Holding a hot dish can be a problem in a matter of seconds with ordinary hot pads but not these beauties: take your time finding a place to set the dish down. No more having to search for Solarcaine! You will love these!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Blaine

customer_reviews.title: Great mitts
customer_reviews.text: This is the only oven mitt you need. The silicone outer and sewn in cloth inner mean that you don't have the temperature issues with other mitts that only are constructed of silicone or fabric alone. I've pulled out cast iron skillets at 450F with these and didn't feel a thing. The length goes pretty high up the forearm so you feel safe when you sketchy pull a large casserole dish from deep out of the oven.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Great oven mitts
customer_reviews.text: They works amazingly well. After burning my fingers on a couple of warn-through parts of my old gloves, these upgrades are a massive improvement. Lots of grip, and lots of heat resistance. Plus the wrists go up pretty far, providing protection for a deep reach to a hot oven
customer_reviews.author: D3vi0us

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after one oven mitt went missing and I think it was a blessing in disguise. These are great! Super heat resistant, easy to get on, comfortable and easy to clean. They are long to avoid arm burns. Bought them in red to give a pop of color too.
customer_reviews.author: Eggs&Sam

customer_reviews.title: My baking life has never been better!
customer_reviews.text: As someone with an irrational fear of ovens but a passion for baking, these mitts are my saving grace. Absolutely no heat gets through these mitts and I no longer fear my elbows touching the walls inside of the oven. I won’t lie, I didn’t believe that silicone mitts would be the way to go, but I couldn’t have been more wrong. I can now bake and cook with such peace of mind!!
customer_reviews.author: Hunnybunny

customer_reviews.title: Great for handing hot dishes that don't require fine dexterity
customer_reviews.text: I was able to pick up a ceramic loaf pan right out of my solar oven and carry it all the way into the house without feeling any heat. They are not as flexible as the cloth gloves, so it is more difficult to do things that require a fine touch, such as handling hot lids.
customer_reviews.author: Book MavenTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good heat protection
customer_reviews.text: I love how far up they go on my arms. I tend to burn my forearm and these protect from heat well. I only wish I could get a smaller size cause my hands are tiny and it makes it hard to do a few things with my hand sliding around.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie T.

customer_reviews.title: I am super happy with these
customer_reviews.text: I cannot compare this to other silicone oven mitts. But not having previously owned any such mitts, I am super happy with these. Not much more to say about this item that has not already been covered by the product description and other reviews. They just simply do what they are supposed to do for a very fair price and much better than cloth,or even leather oven mitts.
customer_reviews.author: rshields

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Received these as a gift. I will never remove a ham or turkey from the oven again without these! They are long enough to protect my arms from getting burned when reaching into the oven to remove food. I also use them to lift hot lids from pots. Great quality! Wonderful gift for those who are just beginning to cook/bake to the experienced :-)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective, but a tad large for my hands.
customer_reviews.text: This are nice gloves, but sometimes I do use a potholder instead, depending on how large a dish is/the size of the handles - the mitts are a bit big for my hand, so they fold more than expected and can actually make it a bit difficult to grasp things sometimes. Overall though, I like the quality, and i feel safer with this material than i do with normal cloth oven mitts.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: The gloves won't fit, I refuse to aquit.
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised at how small these gloves really are. I struggle to get the gloves past my wrists. This product is definitely designed for small hands people.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin in Alabama

customer_reviews.title: Never using anything else.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because the oven mitts we had began to rip, causing my to almost burn my hands many times. I would always have to double up, using 2 mitts, or a bit and pot holder. I was so shocked at how well these worked. I never had to worry about burning myself or even feeling the slightest bit of heat. I was able to hold a 475°F pan without any problems, even though it's listed at safe to 450°F (I wouldn't risk it though). These works as consistently for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: jayland

customer_reviews.title: Zero dexterity is a big problem!
customer_reviews.text: These would be great if they weren't so inflexible for gripping handles, lids, etc. They work for holding the sides of pots very well, and protect the arms. Unless they slide off, which they are prone to do. They are very cute, but I keep going back to the old oven mitts I have.
customer_reviews.author: M. H. Hull

customer_reviews.title: Hard to grip hot cooking utensils!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these silicon oven mitts for myself, my Mom and sister thinking they would work well when we're cooking with our Instant Pots. Because these are silicon I found it hard to slip my hands in and once I managed to do that, I could not get a good grip on the hot pot. The half silicon mitts that come with the Instant Pot work much easier for gripping and they were faster to slide my fingers into. My sister felt the same way and doesn't use the long gloves either.
customer_reviews.author: Bzweller

customer_reviews.title: Well made but not well designed
customer_reviews.text: The mitts are well-made, they’re just not well designed. They don’t grip well and that’s a serious concern when you’re carrying 400+ degree food from the oven. Maybe I should have forced myself to use them until I was comfortable but instead I wound up buying $7 pot holders. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah X

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: So just got it and it came in time for me to pull out my Dutch oven and make bread....so far pretty good. Can’t feel the heat thru the mitts. Very flexible so you won’t strain your thumb trying to hold onto a handle or lid. Don’t know durability yet so I’ll get back to this review after some time.
customer_reviews.author: Elleii

customer_reviews.title: work great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I bought another pair of heat resistant glove and I got burned. The other ones that are not solid silicone have spots where the heat can get in to your fingers. These are solid silicone and easy to clean. Just wash in the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 😍
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. They’re silicon all the way around except the top that is cotton. The inside is so soft and warm. They handle heat perfectly and cover most of your arm so you won’t touch any part of the oven and burn yourself like I always do.
customer_reviews.author: F B.

customer_reviews.title: My search for good gloves is over
customer_reviews.text: I've tried for like 20 years to find a pair of oven mitts that 1. didn't absorb liquids and transfer heat to your hands 2. Grip well even when wet. 3. Handle at least 450 degree F heat from a cast iron pot for more than 30 seconds. I make a lot of bread and every other mitt I've tried failed at least one of these requirements. These don't. I'm gonna get another set as a back up.
customer_reviews.author: MANOWAR©

customer_reviews.title: These are great. The rubber really protects your hand
customer_reviews.text: These are great. The rubber really protects your hand. My last oven mitt, if you held onto the hot whatever long enough, it'd melt the protective cover which ruined the mitt. Don't see this ever happening wiht this one. It's also a nice cloth material on the inside and doesn't feel like you're putting your hand into a stuffed animal.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Hubby Savers
customer_reviews.text: My husband used to burn himself weekly when using the oven. I gifted him these and since then, they have been his go-to gloves as they actually cover past his wrists. The gloves have held up well, protected against high heats, and it doesn't feel 'hot' when you're carrying hot foods. I would buy more, but 2 are lasting us well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Maples

customer_reviews.title: At that point I need to use something else like a towel or whatever with these gloves
customer_reviews.text: I use these all the time. Feels comfy. Heat goes through at about 450F and hotter. I don't normally cook that hot except to season my cast iron. At that point I need to use something else like a towel or whatever with these gloves. I would buy again if these ever break down on me. I've had these for maybe half a year now and it doesn't seem like it's breaking so maybe I'll only buy them if I lose them.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin H.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I'd never purchased silicone mitts before but I took a gamble on these. I love them! Unlike all the mitts I had in the past, these are very easy to clean. They keep my hands and forearms safe. I'm teaching my children to cook and these work for them. The big, bulky cloth mitts were difficult for the kids to use. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: February Jones

customer_reviews.title: You must be model skinny!
customer_reviews.text: These have a terribly small opening. You have to be skin and bones to get these far enough up your arm for your fingers and thumb to reach their place. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hain

customer_reviews.title: Homwe Extra Long Professional Silicone Oven Mitts with Quilted Liner
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these. They are flexible enough to pick up a fork while doing the job they are supposed to do, keeping my hand safe from burning even when taking a cast iron frying pan out of the oven at 425 degrees. Waterproof so you can wash your "hands" if they get messy. They come high enough to protect my arms as well as hands. One thing I haven't done yet is put them in the laundry, but I'm pretty confident they'll be fine. I am really happy with my purchase after buying many other oven mitts and throwing them away pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Leaving_Normal

customer_reviews.title: I love these.
customer_reviews.text: I resisted buying silicone mitts for some time, reading reviews about many different brands and skeptical about the validity of claims. However, I'm pleasantly surprised by the quality and effectiveness of these mitts. They are quite long which provides good protection from scalding steam when removing lids from boiling pots, as well as protecting from heat when removing items from the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good gloves for retrieving oven goods
customer_reviews.text: As a beginner home cook that utilizes the oven frequently, I've burned myself countless times while trying to get the food out of the oven. This product is very useful and has very high heat resistance (from personal experience, 450 degs felt like nothing with these gloves on) The only minor problem is that the gloves are sometimes hard to fit in and is kind of tight. Other than that, I'm satisfied with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Wu

customer_reviews.title: Best oven mitts
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for about 7 months and they’re still like new. They’re perfect - I don’t feel any of the heat. I especially like they’re extra long which help when putting something into the oven. What I like most is that it has heat protection all around the mitt which means I don’t have to think about which one goes on which hand.
customer_reviews.author: Atabey

customer_reviews.title: Hot oven mitts
customer_reviews.text: Great product but wish they were a little more narrow and flexible so they’d fit more snug and I could be more in control of the item/s I’m handling. Heat resistance and grip, plus length, are big advantages over other mitts.
customer_reviews.author: Roningirl

customer_reviews.title: No more oven burns
customer_reviews.text: If you are forever burning yourself with reaching in the oven then this is your solution. These gloves are perfect for grabbing dishes out of a hot oven without the fear of another burn. The length is great to protect your wrist area from those oops moments when working in the kitchen. I love these silicone gloves. Just wish there were more colors so I could coordinate with my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that these wouldn't actually resist heat and my hands would burn but they work very well! A little tough to work with at times, since the silicone material they are made of has so much grip it's tough to rearrange your hands on a baking dish while moving it around or trying to remove it from the oven. But I guess I really can't complain too much better than no grip. Definitely haven't dropped anything!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: After being tired of burning my hands on the cheap oven mitts from the dollar store, I decided to try these. I absolutely love to bake and regularly bake at high temperatures. I had roasted vegetables in the oven at about 425 degrees and these mitts held up beautifully. I was able to keep holding the pan while I mixed the vegetables halfway through cooking, which was something I never could have done with my old mitts. Easily the best purchase I have made on Amazon in a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Beckybecks

customer_reviews.title: Fabric tore during first use
customer_reviews.text: The ring on the cuff of the mitt broke as soon as I hung it on a hook. I hope the rest of the product is more durable. They do seem to keep my hands cool well.
customer_reviews.author: screenwblues

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: These r great and serve the purpose of keeping my hands and forearms safe from heat. The only complaint is the grip is difficult and loose when handling pans and dishes from the oven. Worth the minor issue though.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Driedger

customer_reviews.title: Not good at heat resistance
customer_reviews.text: They’re not good at the one thing they need to be best at: preventing the heat from reaching your hands. They burn my fingers every time I use them for more than a couple of seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Valenziano

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Oven Mitts, Easy to Clean!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Canada and it took some time to get it. But understandable with the circumstance of the world. They are exactly as described. They do a good job with extremely hot surfaces and they clean well. I had cloth ones before that lasted but eventually looked pretty beat up. These look to last long. But only time will tell!!
customer_reviews.author: nkin

customer_reviews.title: Better than Cloth
customer_reviews.text: These are super great for a clutz like me and my dad loves them too. Of the times I’ve used them, they’ve held up to the heat and do way better than any cloth mitts or towels we have and use. The silicon makes it easy to grab things and they are flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Isoteric

customer_reviews.title: Stop Feeling the Burn
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these mitts because I suffered three oven burns within one month. I was using pot holders and other short mitts to reach into the oven and invariably touched a hot shelf. I highly recommend these tough, lengthy fire-proof gloves which extend over the lower arm and keep me out of harm's way. Rather than cringing every time I open the oven door, I can now reach in for my pans with total confidence knowing I will remain unscathed. I don't know why it took me so long to figure out the solution to this continuing problem. I highly recommend these gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t pass these by.  These oven mitts are better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This pair of oven mitts is the best I have ever had. They fit well and are plenty flexible to handle hot pans in and out of the oven. I like the cotton lining. It makes them feel like they fit your hand nicely. The length is nice too. I like that they protect my forearms. I “tested” the mitt by holding the 375° oven rack for a solid 30 seconds and could barely feel any warmth through them. I would definitely recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tam

customer_reviews.title: Given as a JAck and Jill shower gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to some friends as a shower gift from their Amazon Registry list. I have a lot of silicone bake ware and accessories. Told them these are a good investment and work well. Nice thing about them is they provide a good grip on both glass and metal bake ware.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Nashville

customer_reviews.title: Just not for me I guess.
customer_reviews.text: First off, let me say they insulate very well. My gripe is its hard to maneuver your grip. I have trouble picking things up because the material is too flexible. Plus, if you had any nonstick spray on the surface of whatever your grabbing, it's going to be extra challenging. I am always nervous I'm going to drop what I'm holding. I think I'll have to go back to standard mittens.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Knight

customer_reviews.title: Slightly large for small hands
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't expect oven mitts to fit everyone perfectly, so the size isn't a deal killer. Those with larger hands will appreciate the room. Extra length offers better protection than standard length when you're moving items into or out of the oven. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur L. Ranney

customer_reviews.title: Cool gloves
customer_reviews.text: After burning my hands numerous times using cheap cotton hot mitts, I finally pulled the trigger and ordered these. What can I say, they keep my hands cool when I'm pulling pans out of the oven and my hands fit in them comfortable. I haven't cleaned them yet, but with a silicone exterior I do not feel it will be difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More baking less burning hands
customer_reviews.text: No more burning hand or fingers. These are great and easy to clean. We have found ourselves baking more and my kids really love to use the gloves and don’t have to worry about being burned. Will be buying another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Annabel Roque

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for about three years now. No issues with the silicone melting nor with the fabric. These are easy to clean when the mitt gets dirty. These do not block out heat for ever. You can definitely feel a pan if you hold it for long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Good, but on the small side
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are well made and do a good job of protecting you from hot pots and pans. The gloves are apparently made for smaller people. I have average size hands and arms for a man and I have to give it a good tug to get my hand past the cuff and once inside, the cuff stops mid arm before my elbow. I use them, now, without my hands inserted out of ease and convenience, but defeating the purpose of the design.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mitchell

Extra Long – At 14.7” inches long, our oven mitts better protect fingers, hands and wrists from burns. The longer wrist protection keeps you protected from fingertip to past your wrist. This lets you grip pots, pans and cookware safely without slips or spills.

Easy to Clean and Machine Washable – Crafted with BPA-free silicone, our silicone gloves are stain resistant and easily cleanable, with just some warm water & a little soap. They won’t tear, thin or fray.
